general.description: Benteen is one of the Empire's primary agriworlds. It grows most of the crops that are bound for the western systems. It is a quiet world, with little in the way of the bustle and fuss of other, more core, planets.
general.bar: The bar is a place to relax after a long trip or a hard day's work. The beer is fine and the locals seem friendly enough. Mostly harmless.
